summary: Build an e-commerce website similar to Daraz, named "Ryk cart", with WhatsApp-based complaints/support and a purchase-based loyalty points system that rewards users at 20 points with cashback or a mystery box gift.
architectural_notes: Provide a WhatsApp contact link/button for complaints/support using the provided phone number.
Design a loyalty points ledger and redemption rule triggered at 20 points (cashback or mystery box reward).

existing_features.title: Create a Daraz-like e-commerce web app called "Ryk cart" with core browsing and shopping flows: product listing, product details, cart management, and order placement.
Add Internet Identity sign-in and require authentication for placing orders and viewing loyalty points and order history.
Implement a WhatsApp-based complaints/support entry point that opens WhatsApp chat to phone number 03280941320 with a prefilled message template.
Implement a loyalty points system: award points for each completed purchase and display the user’s current points balance.

Add redemption at 20 points: when a user reaches at least 20 points, allow redeeming exactly 20 points for either (A) cashback reward or (B) mystery box gift, and record the redemption in user history.
Add an admin-only product management interface to create, edit, and deactivate products (including name, price, description, category, stock, and images) without external services.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme (not Daraz-copy) across all pages, including typography, spacing, and component styling, while keeping the UI marketplace-friendly.
Add generated static brand and UI images and render them in the UI (store them under frontend/public/assets/generated).

Add a clear empty-state experience on the Catalog (Shop) page when there are zero active products, explaining that no products are available yet and guiding an admin to add products via the Admin → Product Management page.

Add a small, always-available 'How to add products' help entry point for admins that explains the minimum steps to create a product (name, price, category, stock, optional image URLs) and where to find Product Management.
Improve the Admin Products page table empty/loading states so an admin can immediately tell whether products are missing vs. still loading.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a Daraz-like working e-commerce website (marketplace-style shopping experience)
Add complaints/support option that lets users contact via WhatsApp (03280941320)
Implement loyalty points awarded per product purchase
Add rewards redemption at 20 points (cashback or mystery box gift)
Provide a way to add/manage products (admin product creation/editing interface) so the marketplace has items to display
